Rinse idli rice, urad dal, and fenugreek seeds. Soak in water for 6-8 hours. 2. Drain the water and blend urad dal and fenugreek seeds into a smooth batter. 3. Transfer the batter to a bowl. 4. Blend idli rice into a slightly coarse batter. 5. Mix both batters together, adding water as needed to make a thick batter. 6. Add salt to the batter and mix well. 7. Grease idli molds with olive oil. 8. Pour the batter into the molds. 9. Steam idlis in a steamer for 10-12 minutes, until cooked through. 10.
